Literature.Title: Membranolytic Mechanism of Amphiphilic Antimicrobial β-Stranded [KL]n Peptides
Literature.Author: Schweigardt F, Strandberg E, Wadhwani P, Reichert J, Bürck J, Cravo HLP, Burger L, Ulrich AS

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=2 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:92% Hemolysis=256 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli DSM 1116(MIC=8µg/ml),Franconibacter helveticus DSM 18390(MIC=4µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis DSM 347(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus xylosus DSM 20287(MIC=4µg/ml)
